fees.cash_advance_fee: 5% of the amount of each advance, but not less than $10
fees.balance_transfer_fee: 3% of the amount of each transfer, but not less than $5

rewards_program.earn_rate: 2 miles per dollar on every purchase
rewards_program.expiration_policy: Miles do not expire for the life of the account.

extraction_tactics.minimum_payment_calculation: Greater of 1% of the New Balance plus interest, or $25
